channel.title: ★★ Nexus [RSPS] ★ 718 ★ Dedicated Servers ★ Custom Items ★ PKing, PvP & Bosses ★
channel.description:
[CENTER][SIZE=5]Want to try out a new private runescape server that has a whole new experience?[/SIZE]
[IMG]http://nexusrs.tk/images/banner-logo.jpg[/img]
LIMITED TIME OFFER - FREE 3 MONTHS MEMBERSHIP OF DONATOR STATUS WHEN YOU JOIN BEFORE SEPT 4TH,2014
[B][SIZE=4]Features[/SIZE][/B] -Nex -Corp -GWD (no killcount) -Tormented Demons -Evil Chickens -Steel Kiwi Boss -Nomad (Drops havnt been added) -DKS -Lucien -Ice titans -Sea Troll Queen -Safe pvp -Clan wars (safe/dangerous) -Death Match Arena -Wilderness Pking -All skills avaliable -Max cape rewarded when maxed -Donator skilling zone -Skilling benefits -Donator Only Items -Lots of commands for each rank (besides donators) -Shops replace GE due to the GE bug, but GE is still available for those who want it. -Home is Mos Le Harmless. -Few Custom Items -Prestige system (sorted shops) -Custom Clothes Changer -Custom Clothes Colour Changer -Full Summoning obelisk -Auto Voting was removed due to the method. (GTL VOTE) -Custom emote commands
[IMG]http://nexusrs.tk/images/main-1.gif[/img] [IMG]http://nexusrs.tk/images/main-2.gif[/img] [IMG]http://nexusrs.tk/images/main-3.gif[/img] [IMG]http://nexusrs.tk/images/main-4.gif[/img]
[URL=http://nexusrs.tk][IMG]http://nexusrs.tk/images/play_now.jpg[/img][/URL][/CENTER]

item.title: ★★ Nexus [RSPS] ★ 718 ★ Dedicated Servers ★ Custom Items ★ PKing, PvP & Bosses ★
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

Stop quoting the whole thread, it’s annoying as hell.
And I agree with sk8rdude, perhaps instead of donatorship, call it Membership instead. Google what Donating means, then Google what Membership means. Good luck though!

Read full topic

item.title: ★★ Nexus [RSPS] ★ 718 ★ Dedicated Servers ★ Custom Items ★ PKing, PvP & Bosses ★
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

[quote=“kingwarren10, post:3, topic:546333”][quote author=sk8rdude461 link=topic=665233.msg4447051#msg4447051 date=1409356687]
Donator is not membership. Give it a new name.
http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Donor

If you’re giving someone limited membership, then it’s membership. Call it like VIP or something.
[/quote]

Played the server and it’s awesome Great RSPS 9 Out of 10 Cookies[/quote]
Regardless. The gameplay could be awesome, I don’t know because I personally haven’t played.
I’m just saying that offering limited membership should not be called donator membership or anything related to donating. Because it is not.

Read full topic

item.description:
@strikez wrote:

[CENTER][SIZE=5]Want to try out a new private runescape server that has a whole new experience?[/SIZE]

LIMITED TIME OFFER - FREE 3 MONTHS MEMBERSHIP OF DONATOR STATUS WHEN YOU JOIN BEFORE SEPT 4TH,2014

[B][SIZE=4]Features[/SIZE][/B]
-Nex
-Corp
-GWD (no killcount)
-Tormented Demons
-Evil Chickens
-Steel Kiwi Boss
-Nomad
(Drops havnt been added)
-DKS
-Lucien
-Ice titans
-Sea Troll Queen
-Safe pvp
-Clan wars (safe/dangerous)
-Death Match Arena
-Wilderness Pking
-All skills avaliable
-Max cape rewarded when maxed
-Donator skilling zone
-Skilling benefits
-Donator Only Items
-Lots of commands for each rank (besides donators)
-Shops replace GE due to the GE bug, but GE is still available for those who want it.
-Home is Mos Le Harmless.
-Few Custom Items
-Prestige system (sorted shops)
-Custom Clothes Changer
-Custom Clothes Colour Changer
-Full Summoning obelisk
-Auto Voting was removed due to the method. (GTL VOTE)
-Custom emote commands
